products.name: Moonlight Diamond Ring
products.description: A stunning ring featuring a brilliant-cut diamond set in 18k rose gold. The perfect statement piece for special occasions or as an engagement ring.
products.details: 1.2 carat diamond, VS1 clarity, F color, 18k rose gold band, handcrafted in our artisan studio.

products.name: Infinity Sapphire Band
products.description: An elegant band featuring alternating sapphires and diamonds in an infinity pattern. Perfect for anniversaries or as a statement piece.
products.details: 0.5 carat total weight sapphires, 0.25 carat total weight diamonds, 14k gold setting.

products.name: Celestial Pearl Pendant
products.description: A delicate pendant featuring a lustrous South Sea pearl surrounded by a halo of diamonds. Suspended on a fine 18k gold chain.
products.details: 9mm South Sea pearl, 0.15 carat total weight diamonds, 18k gold, 18-inch chain with 2-inch extender.

products.name: Emerald Drop Necklace
products.description: A stunning emerald drop necklace featuring a 2 carat Colombian emerald surrounded by a halo of diamonds. The perfect statement piece.
products.details: 2 carat Colombian emerald, 0.5 carat total weight diamonds, 18k gold, 18-inch chain.

products.name: Aurora Diamond Studs
products.description: Classic diamond stud earrings featuring brilliant-cut diamonds in a four-prong setting. A timeless addition to any jewelry collection.
products.details: 1 carat total weight diamonds (0.5 each), VS2 clarity, G color, 18k gold settings with secure backs.

products.name: Moonlight Diamond Ring
products.description: A stunning ring featuring a brilliant-cut diamond set in 18k rose gold. The perfect statement piece for special occasions or as an engagement ring.
products.details: 1.2 carat diamond, VS1 clarity, F color, 18k rose gold band, handcrafted in our artisan studio.

products.name: Ruby Chandelier Earrings
products.description: Elegant chandelier earrings featuring Burmese rubies and diamonds in an artfully crafted cascade design. Perfect for special occasions.
products.details: 2 carat total weight Burmese rubies, 0.75 carat total weight diamonds, 18k gold, secure lever backs.

products.name: Serenity Diamond Bangle
products.description: A luxurious diamond bangle featuring a continuous line of brilliant-cut diamonds set in 18k gold. A statement piece that transitions effortlessly from day to evening.
products.details: 3 carat total weight diamonds, VS2 clarity, G color, 18k gold, secure clasp, adjustable fit.

products.name: Sapphire Tennis Bracelet
products.description: A classic tennis bracelet featuring alternating sapphires and diamonds set in 18k white gold. Elegant and versatile for any occasion.
products.details: 2.5 carat total weight sapphires, 1.5 carat total weight diamonds, 18k white gold, secure box clasp with safety latch.
